lead_paragraph: The man, Tyrel Martin Marhanka, convicted of growing marijuana for personal use, slashed his throat with scissors at his sentencing, court officials said.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Defendant in Taiwan Case Kills Himself
headline.main: American Kills Himself in Taiwan Court After 4-Year Drug Sentence

snippet: The man, Tyrel Martin Marhanka, convicted of growing marijuana for personal use, slashed his throat with scissors at his sentencing, court officials said.
